"Why not take a approach to your work? Instead of rushing to complete a task, try breaking it down into smaller, more manageable parts and tackle them one at a time. This will help you avoid feeling overwhelmed and allow you to focus on the task at hand."

"Why not try mapping? It's a technique that involves visualizing the steps you need to take to complete a task. This can help you stay focused and motivated, and can also help you identify any potential roadblocks or obstacles you may encounter along the way."

"Why not try using a task queue? A task queue is a list of tasks that you need to complete, prioritized by importance or urgency. This can help you stay organized and focused, and can also help you avoid feeling overwhelmed by the number of tasks you have to complete."

"Why not try using a task manager? A task manager is a software tool that helps you keep track of your tasks, deadlines, and progress. This can help you stay organized and motivated, and can also help you identify any potential roadblocks or obstacles you may encounter along the way."
